title: The Mafraq has 20 years MICE experience
text:
The Mafraq has 20 years MICE experience The Mafraq has 20 years MICE experience Details Created   16:30 It offers 250 rooms and five function spaces The Mafraq Hotel is a 4-star property located in the Khalifa City area of Abu Dhabi, capital of the United Arab Emirates. It has 20 years of experience in hosting corporate events and prides itself on offering a combination of ‘up-to-date MICE facilities, lavish settings, succulent cuisine and an unwavering attention to detail’. It is currently aiming to bring its experience to the notice of a wider global audience. 
There are 250 guestrooms, including 14 suites. There are 195 deluxe rooms, all of the same standard to ensure all members of a group can be treated equally. There are five function rooms, equipped with the latest technology, including the Baniyas Ballroom, which together can cater for a conference for 600 delegates. As many as 2,000 guests in total can be seated to a banquet. A special feature is the hotel’s lush garden and pool that have been the setting for many memorable outdoor events, taking full advantage of Abu Dhabi’s excellent climate. The hotel has five f&b outlets. The Oasis Oriental Restaurant is the home of Arabic and International grill delicacies. The Olive Branch is renowned for its fresh Mediterranean food. Hunter’s B&R offers guests an international and lively atmosphere , whilst Rimal B&R has an Oriental atmosphere. Tasty and convenient dishes are available from the Oasis Courtyard pool bar.
